parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name. You can specify only one domain name.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
